original_text: He did evil in the eyes of the Lord, following the detestable practices of the nations the Lord had driven out before the Israelites.
korean_text: 여호와 보시기에 악을 행하여 여호와께서 이스라엘 자손 앞에서 쫓아내신 이방 사람들의 가증한 일을 본받아

sentences.original_text: He did evil in the eyes of the Lord
following the detestable practices of the nations
the Lord had driven out before the Israelites
